mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plusAns(ansNum, plusNum, userId) VALUES(plusAns_seq.NEXTVAL, #{plusNum}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT qu.num, subject, q.plusNum, content, imgNum, imgName FROM plusQue qu JOIN plusq q ON qu.num = q.num LEFT OUTER JOIN plusImage pi ON pi.plusNum = q.plusNum ORDER BY q.plusNum ASC
SELECT qu.num, subject, content, q.plusNum, ansNum FROM plusAns a JOIN plusQ q ON a.plusNum = q.plusNum JOIN plusQue qu ON q.num = qu.num WHERE userId = #{userId}
